answers.answer: Looks like a severe case of diabetic dermopathy.Anerobic organisms do cause nasty infections like this.I would give such patients a course of metronidazole.Do consult your doctor.

Hello,Since you are a diabetic,so the first possibility is of diabetic ulcers which can be precipitated by stasis of blood.The other possibility is of fungal infections which are slow to respond to standard treatment.I would suggest you to get your blood sugar levels evaluated and consult a dermatologist.A prolonged course of antimicrobials(topical and oral) has to be followed.Hope it helps. Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing or in case you have additional queries. Kind regards.
